titles: A replie vpon the R.R.P.Th. VVinton. for heads of his divinity in his sermon and survey Hovv he taught a perfect truth, that our Lord vvent he[n]ce to Paradise: but adding that he vvent thence to Hades, & striving to prove that, he iniureth all learning & christianitie. To the most honorable henry prince of Great Britany.
author: Broughton, Hugh, 1549-1612.
notes: Place of publication conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Bilson, Thomas, 1546 or 7-1616. --  Survey of Christs sufferings --  Early works to 1800.
